tutorial1:
Touch the Left and Right Arrow Keys to move
You can use the whole screen area above the keys
tutorial2: Touch the Up Arrow Key to jump
tutorial4:
Touch the Up Arrow Key while jumping
to double jump
tutorial5: Hit your enemies to defeat them
